document_data.name: Black Cloaks
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Black Cloaks''' were a secret cabal of [[mage]]s created by the [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]] in the midâ€“13{{th}} century [[DR]], based out of [[Zhentil Keep]].

Loyal to him and of like mind, they were a basis for the [[Zhentarim]] and remained a core element of the Black Network.
